description:
This kit contains everything you need to do a brake bleed on SRAM hydraulic disc brakes, including SRAM XX, XO, Elixir, Code and Juicy series brakes. Kit contents:

  • 2 Bleed Syringes
  • 2 Fitting/Clamp tubes
  • 1 Torx-T25 L-wrench
  • 1 3/8in.-drive 8mm crows-foot
  • 4 Different Bleed Blocks for Juicy, Code and Elixir series hydraulic brakes
  • Bleeding Edge fitting tool
  • One 120 ml bottle of DOT 5.1 fluid
  • Instructions
name: SRAM Standard Bleed Kit with Bleeding Edge Tool
